name: shared-firebase-functions
description: Shared Firebase Functions for BACKBONE Projects

scripts.build-clipshow: npx tsc src/clipShowPro/*.ts --outDir lib/clipShowPro --target es2020 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build-timecards: npx tsc src/timecards/*.ts --outDir lib/timecards --target es2018 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck

author: BACKBONE Team
